Package by.epam.jwd.web.dao

Interface Dao<T extends DbEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - entities that dao used to map entities data to database table structure
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BookDao, CommentDao, LikeDao, OrderDao, SubscriptionDao, UserDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDao
    public interface Dao<T extends DbEntity>
    Data access object base interface for dao layer. Contains all basic dao methods and used by Service interface implementations. Data access object is used to map entities data to database table and otherwise. Throws DAOException when exception in dao layer occurs
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Service, DAOException

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void delete​(java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes saved entity that contains specified id from database table
      java.util.List<T> findAll()
      Finds all entities from database table.
      java.util.Optional<T> findById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Find saved entity by id.
      java.util.List<T> findPage​(int pageNumber)
      Finds page from database table to implement pagination in table defined order.
      int getPagesAmount()
      Returns saved entities pages amount at the moment.
      int getRowsAmount()
      Returns saved entities amount at the moment.
      T save​(T entity)
      Saves entity to database and assign database generated id to entity
      T update​(T entity)
      Performs entity update and returns updated entity

    • Method Detail

      • save

        T save​(T entity)
        Saves entity to database and assign database generated id to entity
        Parameters:
        entity - entity that need to be saved in database
        Returns:
        saved entity with assigned id
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • findAll

        java.util.List<T> findAll()
        Finds all entities from database table.
        Returns:
        all entities list from database table
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • findById

        java.util.Optional<T> findById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Find saved entity by id. Returns Optional instance that is not empty when entity with passed is is present in database table end empty when there is no entity with passed id
        Parameters:
        id - entity id that need to find
        Returns:
        presented or not entity with specified id
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • findPage

        java.util.List<T> findPage​(int pageNumber)
        Finds page from database table to implement pagination in table defined order. Uses limit sql statement to entities in page form.
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - number of needed entities page
        Returns:
        found entities page collection
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • getRowsAmount

        int getRowsAmount()
        Returns saved entities amount at the moment. Used when need to do entities pagination by services
        Returns:
        amount of saved entities
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • getPagesAmount

        int getPagesAmount()
        Returns saved entities pages amount at the moment. Used when need to do entities pagination by services.
        Returns:
        amount of saved entities pages

      • update

        T update​(T entity)
        Performs entity update and returns updated entity
        Parameters:
        entity - entity that need to update in database table
        Returns:
        updated entity
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • delete

        void delete​(java.lang.Long id)
        Deletes saved entity that contains specified id from database table
        Parameters:
        id - saved entity id
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs
